scripts.build:ui: RMDIR /s "D:/Programming files/React/Part 3/exercises/build" && cd ../../Part 2/exercises && npm run build && XCOPY /E /H /C /I "D:/Programming files/React/Part 2/exercises/build" "D:/Programming files/React/Part 3/exercises/build  "
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
